_docs.repo_name: Name of the new environment repository.
_docs.environment: Environment name used for the cluster folder (e.g., api, staging, prod).
_docs.cluster_name: Short identifier used as cluster_prefix and DNS subdomain (e.g., v5).
_docs.project_id: GCP Project ID where resources are created.
_docs.region: GCP region for regional resources (e.g., us-west1).
_docs.zone: GCP zone used in kube context and defaults (e.g., us-west1-b).
_docs.owner: Label used on resources; helpful for cost filtering.
_docs.sql_instance_name: Cloud SQL Postgres instance name (existing or to be created).
_docs.dns_zone: Cloud DNS managed zone name (e.g., em).
_docs.gcp_user_account: Email for google account and letsencrypt.
_docs.vpc_name_override: Optional: existing VPC name to use instead of generated.
